node.name: Water Resistant Rucksack MAKE: WILDCRAFT MODEL: 8903338073864
node.description: Made for the toughest haul with shoulder height and depth adjusters which ensure the comfortability of body against carrying load. Reinforced nylon is used to make light weight design and provide enough strength for carrying load of 45 litre. (SIZE: 540x570x340mm / WEIGHT: 1 Kg / CAPACITY: 45 litre)
node.content: 1> Another Indian Brand from Bangalore that has product variety for rough terrains and careless travellers /2> Reinforced nylon provides water-resistant to 5 hours while no rain cover is provided so users recommended that this bag is good for a short time of rain but do not carry under long time rainfall or inside water /3> Entire back and straps are covered with air breathable mesh fabric that can soak up to 1 litre of sweat which makes it perfect carrying rucksack at hot places(Adults in summer sweat around 2-3 litres per hour) /4> Velcro Zipper and overlap cover is used to wrap all the carrying things inside /5> Carrying capacity is 45 litre which is nearby equivalent to 12 Kg on bag point of view or King size winter quilt.
node.alt: Wildcraft 45 Ltrs Grey and Orange Rucksack

node.name: Gangotri plus Waterproof Rucksack MAKE: WILDCRAFT MODEL: Gangotri Plus
node.description: Breathable, cushioned back system with curved and padded shoulder straps for better comfort. Lighter and durable fabric with waist belt for better load transfer to the hips. 80% waterproof clothing and double machine stitching on stressful junction. (SIZE: 787x335x254mm / WEIGHT: 2.2 Kg / CAPACITY: 65 litre)
node.content: 1> Built-in hydrator pocket provides a breathable mechanism for cloth, also loops on the shoulder straps which are cushioned keeps the supporting aluminium pipe within easy reach, offering a hands-free hydration solution /2> Rip-stop nylon from which the entire clothing of this rucksack is made resists tearing and provide 80% waterproofing against normal rainfall, a rain cover is provided in addition /3> Curved shape of straps and waist belt provide greater weight distribution and also transfer loads to hips which ultimately relax the shoulder of trekker /4> Carrying capacity is 65 litre which is almost the supply and essential for 12 to 13 days trekking and also additional bottom straps for sleeping bag carrying.
node.alt: Wildcraft 65 ltrs Red Hiking Backpack Gangotri Plus Orange

node.name: Water Resistant Rucksack MAKE: BLACK ICE
node.description: Sporty, Unisex and Ergonomically design, this water-resistant rucksack is made for all purpose adventure. Water-resistant polyester, 55 litres capacity and 3 side opening for different packages make it handy at time of travelling. (SIZE: 585x400x300mm / WEIGHT: 1 Kg / CAPACITY: 55 litre)
node.content: 1> Black Ice is a well-known rucksack manufacturing company from India that class its product under affordable price range /2> the outer layer is made with two different fabric material, PU polyester and lining PU polyester while the inner layer is waterproof nylon which provides overall strength to cover /3> Mesh padding is provided at the base, back and shoulder straps for the support to carry the load for a longer time and which also helps in soaking sweat /4> Velcro Zipper for top opening and also special opening compartment at the bottom for shoes of size up to 12 number(Indian Sizing) /5> Mesh pockets at two side for bottle and matt, a rain cover is also provided with a special pocket arrangement for it at back /6> 55 litre capacity in trekking business is equivalent to supply for 10 days which include clothing, food + water and essentials while camping tent bag can be hooked beneath it /7> As per users recommend piggy bank option for the first-time traveller.
node.alt: BLACK ICE 55 Ltrs Rucksack Hiking & Trekking Backpack Travelling Bag Rucksack Lightweight  55L Royal Blue

node.name: Colonel Waterproof Rucksack MAKE: TRIPOLE MODEL: Colonel Series
node.description: Flawless design for long duration hikes, detachable bag pack and dual fabric coating at the bottom makes it ideal for rough terrain. High utility product that has additional carrying capacity using multiple straps. Built for carrying excessive luggage with comfort. (SIZE: 870x350x250mm / WEIGHT: 2.5 Kg / CAPACITY: 95 litre)
node.content: 1> Highly recommended brand by regular trekkers who mostly carry loads of 20 to 30 Kg /2> Two side opening makes flawless design for carrying items makes it on track without loading and unloading option used for carrying items /3> For carrying excessive luggage it is equipped with a fibre frame at the back and compounded by an aluminium rod to provide maximum comfort and better load distribution /4> 12-litre detachable bag is mounted on front which can be used for alternate purpose like small shopping or when the rucksack is not used /5> Straps are filled with soft cushions and covered with sweat soaking mesh fabric /6> Laminated synthetic fabric is used for the clothing of this rucksack which is 80% waterproof but still for heavy rain, a  rain cover is provided /7> Carrying capacity is 95 litre in volume, similar to around 50 Kg of weight which is upmost to carry by the professional trekker.
node.alt: Tripole Colonel 95 litres Rucksack  Detachable Day Pack Black
